direction.raw_text: The Lama throws him the keys and the young monk catches them, smiling from ear to ear. They bow to each other and Neng runs off. Lama Yak La looks after him as a father would. He gets up and strikes the bronze bell with a wooden mallet.

dialogue.raw_text: (in Chinese) Do not believe in anything simply because you have heard it, Neng.

Neng worries that the truck may be breaking down. He pulls up and switches off the engine but to his surprise the steering wheel continues to vibrate. direction.raw_text: Alarm signals go off. The Captain turns to one of his officers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The countdown on the monitor reads 2 min. 40 sec. Laura and Adrian share a worried look. We hear a HOLLOW BELL ring!
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What's wrong with the gate?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't know. Maybe there's something jamming it, sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Lama Yak La rings the large bronze bell of his monastery. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The booming sound echoes through the Cho Ming valley. As a gentle wind catches the Lama's clothes, he looks up-- A tidal wave of immeasurable proportion crests the mountains. The Lama continues to strike the bell as the monastery is wiped clean from the earth. CUT TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The technicians desperately try to figure out what's wrong. An officer waves Adrian over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The video camera moves in on Kate, Noah and Lilly. Adrian can't believe his eyes. He turns to Laura.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain Michaels shouts across the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anheuser looks nervously at the countdown. It reads 1:34
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Sir, we have a breach in the zoological bay.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Can you zoom in?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I know those kids. Remember the book I told you about? Their father wrote it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're loaded. We can close the gates sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Do it!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Above Yuri and the boys, people are leaping from the access platform onto the stern gate of the American ship. Yuri looks for a hole in the flow of people before seizing his chance and lifting the first of his boys up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oleg manages to reach up and hold onto the gate. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Inside the ship, officers yell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The gates suddenly screech back into life and begin to close. Yuri doubles his efforts lifting Alec higher, but Alec cannot quite reach. Yuri strains with all his effort before deciding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yuri leaps forward holding Alec out in his arms. Oleg manages to grab his brother's hands as Yuri lets go and falls into the deep crevasse below. He makes no noise until he hits the rocks beneath. Oleg pulls his brother from above.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (in Russian) Pull yourself up!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) To the lower decks people!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oleg! Catch your brother!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: blasts. Both of Yuri's sons are now on deck. A loading officer pulls them back, away from the gate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The loading officer attempts to comfort them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Officer and the boys look back as the stern gate slowly closes. But with a SCREECHING sound it grinds to a halt. The gate is jammed open leaving a twenty foot gap.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Boys, you gotta move.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We wait for our father! He's still down there!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's no one down there. (GENTLE) Come on boys, come...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: sound. Anheuser and the Captain stare at the monitors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They race over. Adrian points to a monitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the monitor, they see Sarah and the others desperately waiting for Jackson and Lin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bobby, the Surveillance Officer, selects a different camera and we now see inside the tunnel in which Jackson is pulling along a wounded Lin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adrian tries to ignore this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anheuser sneers him, shooting a look to Laura.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Without thinking, Adrian turns and punches Anheuser hard in the face. He drops to the floor, out cold. Everyone stands in stunned silence. Laura smiles. Adrian looks around. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They speed off. The countdown reads 0 min. 53 sec.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Why is the stern gate not closing? (CONTINUED)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Something's wrong with the hydraulics, sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Captain, over here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I think we found the problem.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: How did they get in there?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They must have come through the hydraulic chamber. There...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That guy is injured. Something must have gone wrong.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're damn right something went wrong! Congratulations Helmsley, you may have just killed us all but as long as your conscience is clean...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Let's get an emergency crew there right now. I'll meet them at the Hydraulic Chamber.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You think you're the main man now, just because your fucking the President's daughter?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What are you all waiting for?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Further down in the valley, the tidal wave has reached the Cho Ming airfield, blasting away the planes with overwhelming force.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The massive propellers of the ships begin to turn. However, the props of the American ship don't move. In the background, the huge tidal wave comes thundering towards them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An IMPACT WARNING sounds as Adrian and Laura race through the crammed hallways with members of the rescue crew. One of the officers explains.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: If we can't close the stern gate, then the engines won't start.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's no way to override it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No sir, it has to be done manually.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Kate, Noah and Lilly watch as Jackson nears the end of the tunnel with Lin. Neng comforts his brother who's about to pass out.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (in Chinese) Almost there, Lin...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ! All three vessels are now engulfed in churning water. They rock back and forth. Only the huge support towers they're resting on, keep them anchored.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A new ALARM sounds as water begins to shoot through the open stern gate of the American ship. The people on the loading bay panic, among them we see Alec and Oleg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The same ALARM rings out in the hallways of the ship. Laura, Adrian and their party are all braced against the corridor, as the vessel undulates back and forth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Laura looks unsure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adrian looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Despite the violent movement of the ship, Adrian pushes on down the corridor towards the back of the boat. They follow.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Water has penetrated the stern!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What now?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The rear of the ship will start sealing itself up one compartment at a time.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Then how will we get to the hydraulic chamber?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: If we don't hurry, we won't be able to.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Water is also now rushing into the Zoological Bay and only the giraffe can manage to keep her head dry. Jackson is not yet out of the tunnel with an unconscious Lin. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Kate shouts across to Tamara.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kate reaches in to help Jackson as Tamara begins to move with Lilly. Noah remains back with his mother. Jackson finally makes it through with Lin. Kate is almost tearful with relief to see him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly the Zoological bay begins to seal itself off. Lilly, already in the next compartment with Tamara and her dog, screams out as a chamber door quickly slides up, from the floor to the ceiling. It separates Lilly from her family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jackson and Kate turn but it's too late. They only catch a glimpse of Lilly before they are sealed in. The water level continues to rise.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Tamara! Take Lilly and Noah.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I was so worried about you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Mummy!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Panicked, Tamara turns and looks around. Down the corridor, in the distance, she sees Adrian, Laura and the rescue crew approaching. But between them she spots the next chamber door rising quickly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lilly starts moving as Tamara turns and picks up Caesar. Moving quickly, Lilly is able to climb up and over the fast rising door. But as she dangles from the other side, she looks down and is too scared to jump.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lilly looks up and sees two hands straining to hold Caesar above the quickly narrowing gap. In a courageous move, Lilly grabs the little dog before he gets crushed and together they fall to the ground. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Back on the other side of the chamber door, Tamara looks around. She is trapped now as the water continues to rush in.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Lilly run!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S) (CONT'D) Lilly! Take him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Laura picks Lilly up and comforts her. Adrian realizes they are too late. He turns to the rescue crew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lilly is close to tears.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Is there any way to talk to them?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The water continues to flood in as Jackson helps Neng with his unconscious brother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly, a VIOLENT SHAKE throws them all off balance, pitching them into the water.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We have to move him higher. (looks around) Over there!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: In the debris-filled, murky waters we see that the fuselage of Air Force One has slammed against the first of the ship's launch towers. Slowly it begins to bend, finally giving way. The other launch towers follow like dominos. The ship is ripped from its anchorage and sent drifting sideways, rudderless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chaos. Fear. Everybody holds on for dear life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The vessel is swept away, over the mountain ridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alec and Oleg scream, desperately trying to hold on as the whole ship capsizes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The giant ship drifts upside down and rudderless - smashed around by the debris and raging waters. But then, as it hits another ridge, it rolls right side up and seems to steady itself. However, the strong currents continue to force it through the mountain ranges of the Himalayas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The officers try to regain some control.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Captain's face drops.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Moving at 34 knots, sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What is our position?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Darjeeling valley, heading south east, sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You must be kidding!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The water rises fast as Kate sees the severity of Lin's wound for the first time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A split second later Noah holds out his belt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly Jackson hears a voice over a speaker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kate screams with relief. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We need something to stop the bleeding or he'll die.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Mum, will this do?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (Over a speaker) Mr. Curtis... I'm Adrian Helmsley. We met once before. Your daughter is with me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Lilly!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Adrian is using an emergency wall intercom, with Laura next to him, holding Lilly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Caesar barks.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I'm alright Mom!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Tamara hears Caesar over the speaker in her compartment and smiles with relief. She is struggling to stay afloat though, and is running out of air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jackson discovers the wall speaker. He moves closer to it.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) We can't get to you. Whatever you did, jammed the hydraulics. If you can't get it out... None of us will make it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: All eyes are on Adrian as he speaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adrian looks at Laura.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You're our only hope.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ll go back. I'll try my best.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jackson looks at Kate. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The water is up to their chest now. Jackson takes a breath and disappears underwater.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I'll go with you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You stay with Mommy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'll be right back...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Back on the bridge, Anheuser regains consciousness and gets to his feet. His nose is bleeding. He looks around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Captain looks at him annoyed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anheuser looks at him dumbfounded as he stumbles to the window and sees the massive rock face of Mount Everest in the distance.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Captain, what's happening?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's happening?... (PAUSES) We're heading straight for the north face of Mount Everest, Mr. Anheuser.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Jackson swims down into the dark chamber and reaches the jammed power tool, pulling at it. But it doesn't budge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The water level in Tamara's compartment is at its height now and she goes under. She struggles below the surface for a moment, looking around desperately for a way out but there is none. Tamara drowns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jackson manages to find an air pocket. He fills up his lungs with air and thinks hard. As he strips off his jacket, he seems to have a plan. He dives under again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lin is being held up in the water by his brother and parents. Kate has wrapped the belt around his lower leg and now pulls it tight. Lin screams. Noah uses this as the moment to dive underwater, unnoticed, to go and help his father.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back under water, Jackson is using the extension cord of the power drill to pull himself down to the tool cabinet. Jackson opens it, retrieving a giant crowbar. He begins to use it to dislodge the tool but it's hard work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anheuser and everybody on the bridge stares as the north face of Mount Everest is almost upon them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kate and the Pangs are desperately close to running out of air now, but despite this, Kate still tends to Lin. After a moment she turns and is first confused then horrified to see that Noah is nowhere to be found.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Noah!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Jackson pulls with all his might, but he can't quite shift the drill. To his surprise, a pair of young hands join his on the handle of the crowbar. Noah is alongside him now, helping. Working as father and son, they manage, little by little, to loosen it before finally the drill comes free. Adrian gives Noah the thumbs up and the boy heads back to the surface. Jackson goes to follow but in the last moment he spots the knapsack containing his laptop. He dives back down for it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Noah emerges from the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kate pulls him to her, relieved he is safe. Noah smiles and calls out towards the nearly submerged speaker.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Mom, we did it!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Lilly and Laura wait nervously. They hear a muffled voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adrian leaps up when he hears this. He flicks a button on the intercom.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) We got it free. Can you hear me? We did it!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Captain Michaels - close the gate!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Hearing this, the Captain yells the eagerly awaited order.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: That's affirmative. Close the gate!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ay, ay, Sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: We hear a BOOMING sound as the tail gate finally seals.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jackson reaches his knapsack, but when sees Noah's cell phone lying next to it, he makes a decision and reaches for that instead. He hears the muffled sound of the engines and smiles. But as he turns to swim back, his face freezes-- He's looking into the lifeless eyes of Gordon, who floats inches from his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The gigantic propellers fight against the current, hitting rock at the base of the mountain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The battle seems hopeless. Captain Michaels yells at the top of his lungs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The vessel scrapes against the rocks, throwing Anheuser to the floor.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Engage starboard stabilizers!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: One is engaged... two is engaged... number three is out, sir!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The giant ship escapes the mountain with an inch to spare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone on the bridge watches in awe as Mount Everest, earth's highest peak, drifts slowly past. After a long beat, they begin to holler and cheer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kate hears the CHEERING coming from the speakers. The water level stops rising but she still looks around in panic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Noah begins to cry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Finally! Jackson bursts out of the water and takes a lungfull of wonderful air. Kate and Noah are overjoyed. The Pangs smile to one another. Jackson looks Kate squarely in the eyes. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kate embraces him tightly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Noah is all smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We hear a voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The CAMERA moves over the last lines of Jackson's novel.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Noah! Where is he?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He was just behind me...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: If you would ever consider to give me another chance... I promise, I'll always be there when you need me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Whatever you do... I will never let you go again.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) ... Day 988. No one is waiting for anything to happen...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Adrian sits in his cabin, his copy of `Farewell Atlantis' in his lap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Opposite him, Laura sits listening to him read.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adrian closes the book. There's a moment of silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Laura looks at him grinning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The intimate moment is cut short.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: ...   and all we can hear is the sound of our   own breathing that reminds us we are   still sharing our memories, hopes and   ideas.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ... And funny, just today we found out that the entire crew of the Atlantis, somehow or another, has relatives in Wisconsin. (PAUSE) The end.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: How many copies did you say that sold? (CONTINUED)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Less than 500. (with a smile) It's what you might call a cult classic.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It seems we have very different tastes Mr. Helmsley?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well that's healthy Dr. Wilson. Something we could maybe explore... unless you have other pressing engagements.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Actually my diary's pretty open.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) (over loudspeaker) Mr. Helmsley to the bridge please.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Adrian and Laura make their way to the bridge.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Ladies and gentlemen, this is Captain Michaels speaking. In a few minutes, I will be giving the orders to unseal the decks.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Jackson and his family stand amongst thousands of other people who are gathering in anticipation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jackson kneels down and zips up Lilly's jacket. She is holding Caesar, whose still wearing his diamond collar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jackson squeezes Lilly's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lilly turns to see Yuri's boys standing next to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The boys both smile at her.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Please be careful when you step out and of course... enjoy the fresh air.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Daddy? When can we go back home? (CONTINUED)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's nothing we can go back to Lil'bee. Whatever's out there, that's our home now. Don't be scared.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm not Daddy. No more pull-ups.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's my big girl.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Can we pet him?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Of course you can. He's your doggie.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Adrian and Laura enter the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Captain directs him to a monitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Captain grins at Prof. West.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A monitor reveals an image of the African continent, however its shape changed dramatically. The image of the southern tip is enlarged.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain Michaels hands Adrian a short wave radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adrian curious, grabs the mic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We hear a muffled, raspy voice through the speakers.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You called for me, sir?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Prof. West has something to show you, Mr. Helmsley.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Looks like your scientific projections are way off again.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: . WEST The water is receding much faster than we projected, Adrian...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's that? (CONTINUED)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: . WEST It's hard to believe, but the Himalayas are no longer the roof of the world. It's now the Drakensberg mountains of Kwa-Zulu Natal. The whole African continent has risen several thousand feet and most likely, never even flooded.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Our European colleagues have already set course for it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Here, somebody wants to talk to you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This is Helmsley.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Harry Helmsley stands beside the cruise ship's Captain.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: No, this is Helmsley.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Dad!... Is that you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Adrian is ecstatic. Captain Michaels explains.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We should have a visual of the `Freedom of the Seas' shortly.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Dad. We're coming to pick you guys up. How's Tony?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Harry looks over at Tony who's listening, smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Harry hangs up. He picks up Tony, embracing him wildly.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: He's fine, son. We're all fine. (CONTINUED)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) See you guys soon. Bye dad.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Adrian, still excited from speaking with his dad, grabs Laura and kisses her on the lips. She squeals.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adrian looks at Anheuser, unsure of what he might say.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adrian and Laura exchange a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adrian nods and with a smile to Laura turns to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adrian turns back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anheuser puts out his hand. Adrian takes it.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Put that woman down Helmsley.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Young guys like you with your idealistic dreams, you think you can change the world...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I just pray to God, that you keep on making the right calls... in this new world of ours.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Mr. Helmsley, one more thing.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There was no one.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Pardon me?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There was no white kid better than you. I'm terribly sorry I said that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) This is your Captain speaking. Standby to open Deck 1.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Neng pushes his brother Lin in a wheelchair onto the deck next to his parents. Mrs. Pang turns to her husband.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The old Chinese man forces a little smile. Closer to the front of this crowd Jackson approaches Noah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He takes Noah's cell phone from his pocket and hands it to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jackson is touched to hear him use that word. He smiles and hugs him. Adrian, Laura and Anheuser arrive alongside them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jackson looks at her, smiling playfully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adrian smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly a horn sounds and the sealed deck doors let off a burst of pressurised air. A murmur goes through the crowd. Everyone is silent as the huge deck doors slowly begin to roll back and light streams in. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Pang family try to see over people's heads, even Anheuser looks hopeful. Jackson pulls his family close as the first rays of daylight hit their faces.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Standing by Sir. (CONTINUED)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: . PANG (in Chinese) I wonder will the clouds look the same and the stars?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: .PANG Do not fear. Some things will never change.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I thought you might want this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Do you think I'll still get a signal ... Dad?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I finally finished your book Jackson.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Really? You may well be the first person who ever got to the end.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Excuse me, I believe he's addressing the author. Well, what did you think?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'd say... those astronauts of yours would be shitting themselves, if they knew all their relatives are now stuck in the South Pole.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Hatches unseal all around the ship. Sun streams through the clouds. Everywhere people emerge outside, into the light of day. A majestic moment.
direction.name: direction
